lead_paragraph: Kyrie Irving has talked for weeks about shaking off the rust since his return from a long injury layoff but the Cavaliers guard moved like a well-oiled machine in Cleveland's 122-100 victory over the Toronto Raptors on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Smooth Irving Shines for Cavs in Big Win Over Raptors
headline.main: Smooth Irving Shines for Cavs in Big Win Over Raptors

snippet: Kyrie Irving has talked for weeks about shaking off the rust since his return from a long injury layoff but the Cavaliers guard moved like a well-oiled machine in Cleveland's 122-100 victory over the Toronto Raptors on Monday....
